title: How do huge level discrepancies develop?
body: I'll be playing safely, farming under turret, avoiding unnecessary greed that gets me killed, and generally just trying to scale, and then it somehow turns out that my support is 12, I'm 13, and everyone else in the game is 16-18 (except for our jungler who disconnected ten minutes prior and is "only" 14). How does this happen? Is there a rune or item or meta strategy that increases exp gain?

replies.body:
Well, ADC and support naturally get xp slower than other roles because they have to share. It's fairly normal for the other lanes to be a number of levels ahead, especially if they get picks/don't die.

Just the nature of the beast, I'm afraid.
Exactly this. As a mid laner I often rely on hitting lv 6 before bot lane to make an early play before the enemy bot lane  gets their ultimates.
